text: Marilyn Maxwell (August 3, 1921 â€“ March 20, 1972) was an American actress and entertainer. She was a sex symbol in the 1940s and 1950s. She appeared in several movies and radio programs. She played Hazel Moon in Lost in a Harem (1944). She also played Grace Diamond in Champion (1949). Maxwell was born in Clarinda, Iowa. She died from a heart attack at age 50. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1972 births Category:Actors from Iowa Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Marilyn Maxwell
